sentences.en: And you think you can remain undetected by the Wraith as they go by your position?
sentences.cn: 你确信在幽灵经过你们的时候不会被发现?

sentences.en: But in some cases, the problem goes undetected until failure of the part.
sentences.cn: 但有时, 直到部件失效后才能发现问题.

sentences.en: Changing your perspective can often uncover previously undetected issues in layout and composition.
sentences.cn: 再改变角度看看,这样就可以发现一些布局上和构成上的问题.

sentences.en: How could anyone break into the palace undetected?
sentences.cn: 怎么会有人神不知、鬼不觉地潜入皇宫呢？

sentences.en: If the program begins using a new part of the library, previously undetected collisions may arise.
sentences.cn: 如果程式开始使用这个新版程式库的某一新成分, 上面所说的[未侦测到的冲突]就可能终于爆发.

sentences.en: Let's see if we can get over there undetected.
sentences.cn: 让我们试试能否在不被发现的情况下到达那.
独创性,是未被察觉的剽窃.

sentences.en: Other men do have prostate cancer, but have normalPSAs, allowing the cancer to spread undetected.
sentences.cn: 其他人的确患有前列腺癌, 但是他们的前列腺抗原正常, 这就使得癌细胞扩散却监测不出来.

sentences.en: She looked around to be sure her faux pas was undetected.
sentences.cn: 她看了看四周以确定她失礼的舞步未被发现.

sentences.en: Silent Step - increases stealth by allowing nearby squadmates to move undetected at crouch speed.
sentences.cn: 潜行 - 在指挥官附近队员蹲姿移动时增加潜踪能力.

sentences.en: The thieves escaped undetected through a basement window.
sentences.cn: 那些盗贼从地下室的窗户神不知鬼不觉地逃走了。

sentences.en: They feared some undetected trace of poison.
sentences.cn: 他们担心一些未被识破的投毒痕迹.

sentences.en: They managed to get away from the coast undetected.
sentences.cn: 他们设法神不知鬼不觉地离开了海岸。

sentences.en: Yuke Transport Transport squadron undetected. No problems yet.
sentences.cn: 运输中队未被发现,一切正常.

words.tran_cn: 未被发现的；未检测到的

trans.tran_cn: 未被觉察的，未被发现的，未探测到的
trans.tran_en: if something, especially something bad, goes undetected, no one notices it
